verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, that they separate <S%H5144><s%> themselves from the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and that they profane <S%H2490><s%> not my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> in those things which they hallow <S%H6942><s%> unto me: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Whosoever <S%H376><s%> he be of all your seed <S%H2233><s%> among your generations <S%H1755><s%>, that goeth <S%H7126><s%> unto the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hallow <S%H6942><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> upon him, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from my presence <S%H6440><s%>: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

What man soever <S%H376><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> is a leper <S%H6879><s%>, or hath a running issue <S%H2100><s%>; he shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, until he be clean <S%H2891><s%>. And whoso toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any thing that is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by the dead <S%H5315><s%>, or a man <S%H376><s%> whose seed <S%H2233><s%> <S%H7902><s%> goeth <S%H3318><s%> from him;

Or whosoever <S%H376><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any creeping thing <S%H8318><s%>, whereby he may be made unclean <S%H2930><s%>, or a man <S%H120><s%> of whom he may take uncleanness <S%H2930><s%>, whatsoever uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> he hath;

The soul <S%H5315><s%> which hath touched <S%H5060><s%> any such shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until even <S%H6153><s%>, and shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, unless <S%H518><s%> he wash <S%H7364><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And when the sun <S%H8121><s%> is down <S%H935><s%>, he shall be clean <S%H2891><s%>, and shall afterward <S%H310><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>; because it is his food <S%H3899><s%>.
That which dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>, or is torn <S%H2966><s%> with beasts, he shall not eat <S%H398><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> himself therewith: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

They shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> mine ordinance <S%H4931><s%>, lest they bear <S%H5375><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> for it, and die <S%H4191><s%> therefore, if they profane <S%H2490><s%> it: I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.

There shall no stranger <S%H2114><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%>: a sojourner <S%H8453><s%> of the priest <S%H3548><s%>, or an hired servant <S%H7916><s%>, shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%>.

But if the priest <S%H3548><s%> buy <S%H7069><s%> any soul <S%H5315><s%> with <S%H7075><s%> his money <S%H3701><s%>, he shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it, and he that is born <S%H3211><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>: they shall eat <S%H398><s%> of his meat <S%H3899><s%>.

If the priest's <S%H3548><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> also be married unto a stranger <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%>, she may not eat <S%H398><s%> of an offering <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>.

But if the priest's <S%H3548><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> be a widow <S%H490><s%>, or divorced <S%H1644><s%>, and have no child <S%H2233><s%>, and is returned <S%H7725><s%> unto her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, as in her youth <S%H5271><s%>, she shall eat <S%H398><s%> of her father's <S%H1><s%> meat <S%H3899><s%>: but there shall no stranger <S%H2114><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> thereof.

¶ And if a man <S%H376><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%>, then he shall put <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof unto it, and shall give <S%H5414><s%> it unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> with the holy thing <S%H6944><s%>.
And they shall not profane <S%H2490><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they offer <S%H7311><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>;

Or suffer them to bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of trespass <S%H819><s%>, when they eat <S%H398><s%> their holy things <S%H6944><s%>: for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.
¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Whatsoever <S%H376><s%> he be of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that will offer <S%H7126><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> for all his vows <S%H5088><s%>, and for all his freewill offerings <S%H5071><s%>, which they will offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>;
Ye shall offer at your own will <S%H7522><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, of the beeves <S%H1241><s%>, of the sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or of the goats <S%H5795><s%>.
But whatsoever hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>, that shall ye not offer <S%H7126><s%>: for it shall not be acceptable <S%H7522><s%> for you.

And whosoever <S%H376><s%> offereth <S%H7126><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to accomplish <S%H6381><s%> his vow <S%H5088><s%>, or a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> in beeves <S%H1241><s%> or sheep <S%H6629><s%>, it shall be perfect <S%H8549><s%> to be accepted <S%H7522><s%>; there shall be no blemish <S%H3971><s%> therein.

Blind <S%H5788><s%>, or broken <S%H7665><s%>, or maimed <S%H2782><s%>, or having a wen <S%H2990><s%>, or scurvy <S%H1618><s%>, or scabbed <S%H3217><s%>, ye shall not offer <S%H7126><s%> these unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, nor make <S%H5414><s%> an offering by fire <S%H801><s%> of them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Either a bullock <S%H7794><s%> or a lamb <S%H7716><s%> that hath any thing superfluous <S%H8311><s%> or lacking in his parts <S%H7038><s%>, that mayest thou offer <S%H6213><s%> for a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%>; but for a vow <S%H5088><s%> it shall not be accepted <S%H7521><s%>.

Ye shall not offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that which is bruised <S%H4600><s%>, or crushed <S%H3807><s%>, or broken <S%H5423><s%>, or cut <S%H3772><s%>; neither shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> any offering thereof in your land <S%H776><s%>.

Neither from a stranger's <S%H5236><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> <S%H1121><s%> shall ye offer <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%> of any of these; because their corruption <S%H4893><s%> is in them, and blemishes <S%H3971><s%> be in them: they shall not be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for you.
¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

When a bullock <S%H7794><s%>, or a sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or a goat <S%H5795><s%>, is brought forth <S%H3205><s%>, then it shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> under the dam <S%H517><s%>; and from the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and thenceforth <S%H1973><s%> it shall be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for an offering <S%H7133><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And whether it be cow <S%H7794><s%> or ewe <S%H7716><s%>, ye shall not kill <S%H7819><s%> it and her young <S%H1121><s%> both in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
And when ye will offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, offer <S%H2076><s%> it at your own will <S%H7522><s%>.
On the same day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be eaten up <S%H398><s%>; ye shall leave <S%H3498><s%> none of it until the morrow <S%H1242><s%>: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Neither shall ye profane <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>; but I will be hallowed <S%H6942><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which hallow <S%H6942><s%> you,
That brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be your God <S%H430><s%>: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
